About the Company: Vadilal Industries Ltd is engaged in the manufacture and sale of ice-cream and processed food products. The company`s ice-cream segment offers a range of ice creams and frozen desserts in packs, including cups, party packs, family bricks, dollies, cones, and candies. Their processed foods segment offers frozen foods, such as mango pulp, frozen fruit, pulp, and vegetable and ready to eat/serve food. The company also engages in real estate, forex management, money changing, cold storage, and chemicals and specialty gases businesses. They operate in India, the Middle East Asia, North America, Europe, the Asia pacific, and Africa.
